entries.message: Some customers are currently experiencing slower than normal instance deployment, reinstall, and closure times for VPS instances at all locations.   This affects both the Vultr control panel and the Vultr API.   Our engineering team is aware of this issue and is working diligently to resolve this as quickly as possible.

Event Type: Network Upgrade

We are performing system changes in the Atlanta location during the following scheduled maintenance window. 

Start Time: 2021-01-05 08:00:00 UTC
End Time: 2021-01-05 12:00:00 UTC

We schedule higher impact maintenance events during off-peak times to maintain our ideal hosting environment. Our engineers make every effort to minimize system impact; however, Atlanta instances may be unreachable for some, or all, of the scheduled maintenance window as we perform network, firmware, or host upgrades.

alerts.subject: New Jersey Partial Private Network Outage

entries.message: We are currently experiencing a partial outage of the private network at our New Jersey location.  Our network engineers are actively working to restore connectivity as quickly as possible.
We are currently experiencing packet loss affecting some servers and routes for our New Jersey location. Our network engineers are actively working to resolve the issue as quickly as possible.

alerts.subject: New Jersey Servers Partial Power Outage

entries.message:
We experienced a partial power outage to a subset of servers in our New Jersey location overnight.  While most of the affected systems should have power and connectivity again now, our engineers are working to correct the remainder as soon as possible.

Thank you for your patience and understanding.
